bug.author: lalithvaka
bug.summary: Upgrading 1.0.0 to 1.0.1 fails with "invalid config: apiVersion is not found."
bug.description:
/kind bug
âžœ sudo kfctl build -f /Users/lalithvaka/installs/kfctl_upgrade_spec.yaml -V INFO[0000] Downloading /Users/lalithvaka/installs/kfctl_upgrade_spec.yaml to /tmp/532268644/update.yaml filename="v1alpha1/application_types.go:129" INFO[0000] Found KfCfg with matching name: kf-poc1 version: v1.0.0 at kf-poc1/kfctl_istio_dex.v1.0.0.yaml filename="kfupgrade/kfupgrade.go:195" INFO[0001] Downloading <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/manifests/blob/master/kfdef/kfctl_istio_dex.v1.0.1.yaml>https://github.com/kubeflow/manifests/blob/master/kfdef/kfctl_istio_dex.v1.0.1.yaml</denchmark-link> to /tmp/408838771/tmp_app.yaml filename="loaders/loaders.go:71" Error: couldn't load KfUpgrade: (kubeflow.error): Code 500 with message: Encountered error while creating new KfApp kf-poc1: (kubeflow.error): Code 500 with message: Could not load <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/manifests/blob/master/kfdef/kfctl_istio_dex.v1.0.1.yaml>https://github.com/kubeflow/manifests/blob/master/kfdef/kfctl_istio_dex.v1.0.1.yaml</denchmark-link> . Error: (kubeflow.error): Code 400 with message: invalid config: apiVersion is not found. Usage: kfctl build [flags] Flags: -f, --file string Static config file to use. Can be either a local path: export CONFIG=./kfctl_gcp_iap.yaml or a URL: export CONFIG=<denchmark-link:https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kubeflow/manifests/v1.0-branch/kfdef/kfctl_gcp_iap.v1.0.0.yaml>https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kubeflow/manifests/v1.0-branch/kfdef/kfctl_gcp_iap.v1.0.0.yaml</denchmark-link>
export CONFIG=<denchmark-link:https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kubeflow/manifests/v1.0-branch/kfdef/kfctl_istio_dex.v1.0.0.yaml>https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kubeflow/manifests/v1.0-branch/kfdef/kfctl_istio_dex.v1.0.0.yaml</denchmark-link>
export CONFIG=<denchmark-link:https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kubeflow/manifests/v1.0-branch/kfdef/kfctl_aws.v1.0.0.yaml>https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kubeflow/manifests/v1.0-branch/kfdef/kfctl_aws.v1.0.0.yaml</denchmark-link>
export CONFIG=<denchmark-link:https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kubeflow/manifests/v1.0-branch/kfdef/kfctl_k8s_istio.v1.0.0.yaml>https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kubeflow/manifests/v1.0-branch/kfdef/kfctl_k8s_istio.v1.0.0.yaml</denchmark-link>
kfctl build -V --file=${CONFIG} -h, --help help for build -V, --verbose verbose output default is false couldn't load KfUpgrade: (kubeflow.error): Code 500 with message: Encountered error while creating new KfApp kf-poc1: (kubeflow.error): Code 500 with message: Could not load <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/manifests/blob/master/kfdef/kfctl_istio_dex.v1.0.1.yaml>https://github.com/kubeflow/manifests/blob/master/kfdef/kfctl_istio_dex.v1.0.1.yaml</denchmark-link> . Error: (kubeflow.error): Code 400 with message: invalid config: apiVersion is not found What did you expect to happen: Anything else you would like to add: [Miscellaneous information that will assist in solving the issue.] Environment:
Kubeflow version: 1.0.0 kfctl version: (use kfctl version): kfctl v1.0.1-0-gf3edb9b Kubernetes platform: (e.g. minikube) : onPrem Kubernetes version: (use kubectl version): OS (e.g. from /etc/os-release):

comments.comment:
Issue-Label Bot is automatically applying the labels:
Label Probability
kind/bug 1.00
Please mark this comment with or to give our bot feedback! Links: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/marketplace/issue-label-bot>app homepage</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://github.com/marketplace/issue-label-botdata/kubeflow/kubeflow>dashboard</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/hamelsmu/MLapp>code</denchmark-link> for this bot.

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/lalithvaka>@lalithvaka</denchmark-link> I tried the upgrade flow and wasn't able to reproduce the same issue. In case you are looking for stable version releases your config URIs should be pointing at v1.0-branch configs. Here's my config for reference: <denchmark-code>apiVersion: kfupgrade.apps.kubeflow.org/v1alpha1 kind: KfUpgrade metadata: name: kf-upgrade-v1.0.1 spec: currentKfDef: name: kubeflow-app version: v1.0.0 newKfDef: name: kubeflow-app version: v1.0.1 # Replace this with the path to the KfDef that you are upgrading to baseConfigPath: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kubeflow/manifests/v1.0-branch/kfdef/kfctl_istio_dex.v1.0.1.yaml </denchmark-code>
Let me know in case if I've missed anything.

hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/krishnadurai>@krishnadurai</denchmark-link> here is what I have as well apiVersion: kfupgrade.apps.kubeflow.org/v1alpha1 kind: KfUpgrade metadata: name: kf-upgrade-v1.7.1 spec: currentKfDef: # Replace with the name of your Kubeflow app name: kf-poc1 version: v1.0.0 newKfDef: # Replace with the name of your kubeflow app name: kf-poc1 version: v1.0.1 baseConfigPath:https://github.com/kubeflow/manifests/blob/master/kfdef/kfctl_istio_dex.v1.0.1.yaml Not sure if the metadata name is the issue where I have it listed as kf-upgrade-v1.7.1 which is a typo.
Realized my base config path is wrong. Closing the issue.
